Verses: 1 idho, Yoodhaavukkum Erusalemukkum Undaayirukkira Siraiyiruppai Naan Thiruppum Annaatkalilum Akkaalaththilum,

2 naan Sagala Jaadhiyaaraiyum Kootti Yosabaaththin Pallaththaakkile Avargalai Irangippogappanni, Avargal En Janaththaiyum Isravelennum En Sudhandharaththaiyum Purajaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththu En Dhesaththaip Pangittukkondadhinimiththamum,

3 avargal En Janaththinperil Seettuppottu, Aankuzhandhaigalai Vesippanaiyamaagak Koduththu, Madhubaanam Pannumpadi, Penkuzhandhaigalai Dhraatcharasaththukkuk Kirayamaagak Koduththadhinimiththamum, Ange Avargalodu Vazhakkaaduven.

4 theeruve, Seedhone, Pelisthiyaavin Sagala Ellaigale, Ungalukkum Enakkum Enna? Ippadi Enakku Sarikkattugireergalo? Ippadi Enakku Sarikkattuveergalaagil, Naan Thaamadhamindri Adhiseekkiramaai Neengal Sarikkattugiradhai Ungal Thalaiyinmel Thirumbumpadi Seyven.
5 neengal En Velliyaiyum En Ponnaiyum Eduththu, Inbamum Uchchidhamumaana En Porulgalai Ungal Kovilgalile Kondupoi,
